text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of the other leg of trapezoid $QRST$.
The length of the line $TS$ is $2x$.
The length of the line $PM$ is $20$.
The length of the line $QR$ is $6x$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $M$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of trapezoid $QRST$.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of the other leg of trapezoid $QRST$.
The length of the line $TS$ is $2x$.
The length of the line $PM$ is $20$.
The length of the line $QR$ is $6x$.
line_instances: There are lines $MS$, $PM$, $QP$, $QR$, $QT$, $RM$, $RS$, $TP$, and $TS$, forming the trapezoid $QRST$ and its diagonals.
